bug.author: Inkln
bug.description:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/catalyst-team/catalyst/blob/master/catalyst/utils/seed.py>https://github.com/catalyst-team/catalyst/blob/master/catalyst/utils/seed.py</denchmark-link> incorrect compare of tf versions
To Reproduce Steps to reproduce the behavior:
install tensorflow 1.4.1 or 1.3.1 or similar before catalyst
Expected behavior tf.set_random_seed(seed) is called Screenshots If applicable, add screenshots to help explain your problem. Additional context Add any other context about the problem here.
